root.name: Infinity Blade: Dungeons
root.description: OverviewInfinity Blade: Dungeons is the third game in the Infinity Blade franchise, and was being developed by Impossible Studios, former employees of Big Huge Games.Project HiatusOn February 8, 2013, Epic Co-Founder Tim Sweeney, had announced that Epic would be severing ties with Impossible Studios, citing irreconcilable differences. As a result development on Infinity Blade: Dungeons would be put on hold until further notice."...we saw the opportunity to help a great group of people while putting them to work on a project that needed a team. It was a bold initiative and the Impossible folks made a gallant effort, but ultimately it wasnâ€™t working out for Epic." - Tim Sweeney
